Vulnerability: Token parameter used directly in Authorization header without validation, allowing CRLF injection
Fix Applied: Added buildSafeAuthHeader() to validate and sanitize token, reject invalid tokens with error

Vulnerability: Cookie value used directly in Authorization header without validation, potential for header injection
Fix Applied: Added buildSafeAuthHeader() to validate token from cookie, reject invalid tokens with error

Vulnerability: Content-Type header without sanitization, potential for header injection
Fix Applied: Added sanitizeContentType() to validate and whitelist allowed content types

Vulnerability: Environment variable token used directly in Authorization header without validation, also had syntax error with gotifyResponse variable scope
Fix Applied: Added buildSafeAuthHeader() to validate env token, fixed variable scope by declaring outside try-catch
